tool_description: Newsfeed showing the latest climate change news worldwide.
name: Climate Change News API
title: Climate Change News API

api_list.name: Climate Change News from Specific News Source
api_list.description: Climate change news from specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com/news/cnn"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
